name: Run the Race
description:
Like impossible games? Navigate perilous tracks at outrageous velocities but avoid the gaps! Go full-throttle and aim for the next checkpoint. How far can you go?

"An incredible abstract runner with a nostalgic arcade feel" - 5 Stars, Singapore
"Great game and dynamic music" - 5 Stars, Russia

FEATURES
• Turbo-charged gameplay at a solid 60fps
• Intuitive controls
• Flawless graphics
• Featuring heart-thumping music from F-777 and Semaphore
• Leaderboards...share your impossible achievements
• Procedural generation...no racing track is ever the same!

Download Run The Race now and claim your crown of victory!!

PREMIUM (unlock within game)
• Restart from checkpoints!
• 3 Extra game modes!
